column2: "Ah, <%me> are you on a quest as well?"
"I'm going out as well for the millionth time to find this guy's friend."
"It's not like I asked you to come all the way out here with me."
"Today, where should we start searching from?"
"Hey don't pretend like you didn't hear me."
"But since you're here, would you like to tag along?"
"To be honest with only this girl here, I don't really feel at ease."
"Hey, what's that supposed to mean?"
"Don't worry about it. Could you explain the situation to our friend here?"
"<%me>, it's just like he says, would you like to come along with us?"
"2. Go along with Echo"
"1. There's something I was planning on investigating"
"I see, then that settles that."
"Really? Really? Oh come on dude, really? I can't take much more of this person."
"Get out of my way. Come on, let's get back to searching with just the two of us."
"Why did it have to turn out like this?"
"Really, you'll come with us? It'd be nice to go with you and leave her behind!"
"You'd better remember you said that."
"His Will Inherited"
"第1章 受け継がれる意志"
